fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- 2750: Beekeeper Head must spawn.
- Cannot spawn unless there is at least one "Beekeeper" role. A "Beekeeper" role is one with "beekeeper" in its name, or one that uses bees to pay for ability costs.
- Factional chat
- No factional kill
- Converted "Beekeepers" win with this faction and their original.
